name: ElasticScalability
tag_list: cloud, iaas, paas, saas, bigdata, analytics, search-and-semantics
overview:
ElasticScalability is a Cloud IaaS/PaaS product and services company.

Our Hybrid IT platform is a modular platform that helps enterprises as well as startups to mould their entire Infrastructure and Application to their needs. The modularity in design is brought in to provide the customization.

It is a complete solution to answer all the infrastructure and application needs, yet keeping the uniqueness of business, processes and culture of the company.

We are moving to a SaaS offering shortly.

offices.address1: #101, Salarpuria Cambridge Residency, Cambridge Layout, Ulsoor
